    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Representing the Age of Revolution &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365983">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365983">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365983">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365983">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Outreach and Scholarly Communication Librarian
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Subject Specialist
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo, MSN): refcannon
           <br />
           Reference desk IM: talktotrexler
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365983" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365984">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365984">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365984">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365984">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365984" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365985">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365985">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365985">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365985">
          <div id="boxatt17365985" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20443226">
              American Historical Association's Guide to Historical Literature
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library level A 016.9 G946, 1995
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20443243">
              <a id="link_20443243" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443243,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing the Age of Revolution', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. Several hundred of the best academic-audience encyclopedias.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20443260">
              <a id="link_20443260" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search~S0?/tencyclopedia+of+the+enlightenment/tencyclopedia+of+the+enlightenment/1,1,2,B/frameset&amp;FF=tencyclopedia+of+the+enlightenment&amp;2,,2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443260,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing the Age of Revolution', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20443260}); ">
               Encyclopedia of the Enlightenment
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Online academic encyclopedia available by library subscription. Well-suited to topics related to the French Revolution.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20443266">
              Historical Dictionary of the French Revolution 1789-1799
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library level C 944.0403 S429h
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365986">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365986">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365986">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books in our collection and elsewhere
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365986">
          <div id="boxatt17365986" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20443282">
              <a id="link_20443282" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443282,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing the Age of Revolution', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               For a preview of a book
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365987">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365987">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365987">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly articles, full text or ordered on interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365987">
          <div id="boxatt17365987" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20443203">
              <a id="link_20443203" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443203,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing the Age of Revolution', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals from every discipline. Includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20443296">
              <a id="link_20443296" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443296,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing the Age of Revolution', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for European history 1450-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20443303">
              <a id="link_20443303" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443303,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing the Age of Revolution', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456735}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for literary criticism.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365988">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365988">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365988">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365988">
          <div id="boxatt17365988" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20443207">
              <a id="link_20443207" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443207,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing the Age of Revolution', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20443208">
              <a id="link_20443208" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20443208,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Representing the Age of Revolution', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our Journal Locator (see above) to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4713051" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17365989">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365989">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365989">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Creating a bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365989">
          <p>
           For assistance in creating an annotated bibliography, visit Purdue University's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/01/">
            <em>
             Annotated Bibliographies
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365989" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17365990">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17365990">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17365990">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17365990">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17365990" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
